title: How to search for free books available in the Kindle app - Quora

response.answer_text: Books are not available in the Kindle app. The Kindle app is a reader. Not a search function. You find books on the Amazon website. You can search the Kindle store for them. But if you only want free books, find any book, scroll down until you find the 3 ranks, click on one of the categories, and then click the free tab. Here you can find all the top free books, sorted by category and rank. ‘Buy’ the ones you want, and they will download onto your Kindle.
